## Champion.spells property

The champion's spells (abilities), mapped by the key they are assigned to, by default - Q, W, E, R, respectively.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly spells: Collection<'Q' | 'W' | 'E' | 'R', ChampionSpell>;
```
